name: 346. Lost in the Noise
description: There are times when the noise of the world drowns everything else out, and I feel lost in it. Living with a disability means facing a world that's sometimes too fast, too loud, and too overwhelming. But in the midst of the noise, I find a space for myself, a place where I can breathe and hear my own thoughts.

attributes.value: pink, purple, turquoise, dark blue, yellow
